txt.en: You have accompanied Aculf and his companions to Atburg to try and rout the brigands there.
'This is it, [placeholder]...there is no turning back. We must clear these brigands out, or die trying! Forth the Ã‰orlingas!'
'Well done, [placeholder]! We have driven off the brigands...for now at least. They are resilient and will likely return, but they will be weaker for it.'
You must drive all of the brigands from Atburg.
Speak with Aculf about your victory.
'Let us leave before the brigands return.'
